Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Deck active 
      private int activeSize 
      private Deck discard 
      private ArrayList<Card> discardList 
      private int discardSize 
      static int LIST_SIZE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      No Arg Constructor creates a player with a standard shuffled 52 card active deck and initializes discardSize to 0 and discardList is created with initial size 104 (since that is the max it could be if a player won every hand)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void discard(Card... cards)
      discard method- Variable argument method that adds a variable number of cards to the discardList and increments discardSize each time
      Card draw()
      draw method returns the top card from the active deck
      int getActiveSize()
      getActiveSize calculates and returns the value of the activeSize field
      int getDiscardSize()
      getDiscardSize returns the value of the discardSize field
      static void main(String[] args) 
      void shuffleDiscard()
      shuffleDiscard method shuffles the discard pile into the active deck

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
